title: The Giro d’Italia Sprint Field is Crazy Deep. Insiders are Forecasting Chaos.
content:
'Numerous trains, chaotic finishes': Up to a dozen contenders and the chance of shaky leadouts has the Giro peloton on watch for carnage.

Read the full article at The Giro d’Italia Sprint Field is Crazy Deep. Insiders are Forecasting Chaos. on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
